General.Name: Ease2pay NV
General.Description: Ease2pay N.V. provides online payment services and platform in the Netherlands. It offers payment transaction platform, which offers users services to order and pay in one action and parking solutions. The company was formerly known as DOCDATA N.V. and changed its name to Ease2pay N.V. in February 2018. Ease2pay N.V. is headquartered in Waalwijk, the Netherlands. Ease2pay N.V. is a subsidiary of The Internet of Cars V.O.F.
